params._value: the max amount they can spend

params._extraData: some extra information to send to the approved contract
params._value: the max amount they can spend
the amount of money to burn

params.freeze: either to freeze it or not

params.mintedAmount: the amount of tokens it will receive

params.amount: amount of tokens to be sold

params.newBuyPrice: Price users can buy from the contract
params.newSellPrice: Price the users can sell to the contract

approve(address,uint256).notice: Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf, and then ping the contract about it

burn(uint256).notice: Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

buy().notice: Buy tokens from contract by sending ether

freezeAccount(address,bool).notice: `freeze? Prevent | Allow` `target` from sending & receiving tokens

mintToken(address,uint256).notice: Create `mintedAmount` tokens and send it to `target`

setPrices(uint256,uint256).notice: Allow users to buy tokens for `newBuyPrice` eth and sell tokens for `newSellPrice` eth

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Send `_value` tokens to `_to` in behalf of `_from`
